fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Disable one ability or attribute from yourself other than this one.
- At night, choose to become roleblock and redirect immune
- At night, choose to have powerful defense.
- At night, choose to roleblock a random visitor.
- At night, visit a player. They may choose to Disable any 2 of your attributes or abilities, or Disable none.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May choose any number of abilities to use each night
- If you transformed into this role, you don't retain any abilities from your previous role, you cannot win by other methods than Inert 3493's condition. If your previous role gave you abilities after transforming into Inert, you don't gain those abilities and attributes. This attribute may not be Disabled.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have no abilities or attributes remaining except Disabling
